lobby.name: Career Lobby
lobby.description: You stand in the grand lobby of Michael Borck's career. Digital displays show streaming data of achievements and experiences. Corridors lead to different career phases.

military.name: Military Command Center
military.description: RAN Submarine Systems Centre. Security clearance required. The walls are lined with classified project files and strategic communications equipment.

academic.name: University Lecture Hall
academic.description: Curtin University. The hall echoes with the sound of engaged students. Whiteboards covered with AI algorithms and system designs.

research_lab.name: AI Research Laboratory
research_lab.description: State-of-the-art AI research facility. Neural networks train on massive datasets. Computer vision algorithms process imagery in real-time.
research_lab.ascii:
🧠 AI RESEARCH LAB 🧠
    Computer Vision | Machine Learning

consulting.name: Consulting Office
consulting.description: A modern workspace filled with client projects and innovative solutions. Multiple monitors display dashboards and development environments.
consulting.ascii:
💼 CONSULTING SERVICES 💼
    AI Strategy | EdTech | Systems

education.name: Education Center
education.description: Shelves lined with technical books and educational materials. A place of continuous learning and knowledge sharing.
education.ascii:
📚 EDUCATION HUB 📚
    PhD | BSc | Grad Dip

innovation_lab.name: Innovation Laboratory
innovation_lab.description: Where ideas become reality. Prototypes and proof-of-concepts everywhere. The latest AI tools and frameworks ready for experimentation.

terminal.description:
A retro terminal displaying contact information:
Email: michael.borck@curtin.edu.au
LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/michaelborck
GitHub: https://github.com/michael-borck

readme.description:
A README file that says:
'Welcome, traveler. Type HELP for commands. Your journey through this career awaits.'

project_files.description: Military messaging system documentation. Critical infrastructure that connected defense communications.

security_badge.description: IT Manager - Submarine Systems Centre, RAN. Jul 1996 - Jan 2000. Level: CLASSIFIED

python_textbook.description: 'Python Step By Step in an AI World' - A comprehensive guide authored by Michael Borck

teaching_award.description: Certificate of Excellence: 100% Student Satisfaction Score - ISYS3015, ISYS2001, ISYS6018

thesis.description: PhD Thesis (2017): 'Feature Extraction from Multi-modal Data' - Combining GIS, Machine Learning & Computer Vision

reality_reigns.description: Swipe-based decision game providing interactive fiction storytelling. 290+ downloads and growing!

talk_buddy.description: AI-based audio interface for conversation practice. Used for medical diagnoses, HR discussions, and language learning.

cloud_core_sim.description: Complete virtual company simulation with IT infrastructure, policies, and chatbot staff. Students love it!

feedback_forms.description: Student feedback: 'Michael is an absolute legend', 'He really cared about my learning', 'Hard but fun!'

books.description:
Four published books (Creative Commons):
- Python Step By Step in an AI World
- JumpStart Python in the AI Era
- Intentional Prompting: Blending AI and Human Oversight
- Python Dev Book: From Zero to Production

publications.description:
Academic publications:
- 6+ peer-reviewed papers on computer vision and machine learning
- Conference presentations on AI in education
- Research on automated feature extraction

certificates.description:
Educational qualifications:
- PhD Computer Science (2017)
- BSc Computer Science Honours (2001)
- Graduate Diploma in Business (2000)

client_portfolio.description:
Consulting clients include:
- CRCSI & Landgate WA (Computer Vision)
- Educational institutions (AI Strategy)
- Various startups (Technical Advisory)

consulting_toolkit.description:
Essential consulting tools:
- AI/ML frameworks and platforms
- Educational technology solutions
- System architecture templates
